poem:
Degrees of Freedom in Sound

In this world of circuit paths,  
Gwenan weaves a tapestry of air,  
spinning silence into sound,  
where thought and pulse entwine.  
Her fingers, sculptors of the void,  
find rhythms in the space between  
beats—a cosmos in retreat—  
where the heart learns to breathe  
in the silence of altered time.
